meico.pitches

Class Pitches

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.pitches.Pitches

  • public class Pitches
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the list of pitch features for a piece of music. It supports also Chroma features.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<FeatureVector> features 
      private java.io.File file 
      private Key key 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pitches()
      default constructor creates an empty Pitches object with the Key set to Chroma type features
      Pitches(Key key)
      constructor creates an empty Pitches object with the given key

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addFeatureAt(int index, FeatureVector feature)
      add a pitch feature vector at the given index; if there is already a vector at that index, their values will be added

      returns the jason string in its compact form (pretty print = false)

      returns the json string

      returns the pitch feature vector at the given index or null if index out of bounds

      converts this class instance into a JsonObject, including the key
      boolean writePitches()
      write the pitch features to a file with default filename
      boolean writePitches(boolean prettyPrint)
      write the pitch features to a file with default filename and the specified text layouting option
      boolean writePitches(java.lang.String filename)
      write the pitch features to a file with the specified filename, prettyPrint is set false for memory efficiency
      boolean writePitches(java.lang.String filename, boolean prettyPrint)
      write pitch features to a file with specified filename (filename should include the path and the extension .pch)

      • getFeatureAt

        public FeatureVector getFeatureAt(int index)
        returns the pitch feature vector at the given index or null if index out of bounds
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the pitch feature should be in [0, features.getSize()-1], otherwise null is returned
        Returns:

      • addFeatureAt

        public boolean addFeatureAt(int index,
                            FeatureVector feature)
        add a pitch feature vector at the given index; if there is already a vector at that index, their values will be added
        Parameters:
        index -
        feature -
        Returns:
        true if the operation has been performed successfully, otherwise false

        Returns:

      • writePitches

        public boolean writePitches(java.lang.String filename,
                            boolean prettyPrint)
        write pitch features to a file with specified filename (filename should include the path and the extension .pch)
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename string; it should include the path and the extension .json
        prettyPrint - set true for better readability, set false for better memory efficiency
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured
